goal.ch: 由高分子物性、化性及機械性進而去設計並探討如何選擇適當的塑膠材料後，建?模具設計與射出成型技術之基本概?，認識射出成型之原理與製程，包括不同材料之成型特質與基礎模具設計概念，課程中同時搭配電腦輔助工程分析軟體Moldex3D，模擬成型過程，用以輔助學習塑膠射出成型，培養獨?思考並能有效?用工具解決問題之能?。
goal.en: "The goal of this course is to understand the principle and process of injection molding, including material properties and the basic conception of mold design. While a well-known CAE software, Moldex3D, is used to model the molding process for learning the plastic injection molding."

outline.ch:
"1. 射出成型技術與製程介紹
2. 高分子材料簡介
3. 精密模具設計概論
4. 射出成型機一般的設計及功能之程序特性概述
5. 射出成型機規格與性能
6. 先進射出成型製程
7. 實機射出參觀
8. 製程與CAE簡介/Moldex3D操作
9. 充填/保壓結果判讀
10. 冷卻/翹曲結果判讀
11. 射出成型之後加工
12. 學生口頭報告"
outline.en:
"1. Introduction of injection molding technology and its process
2. Introduction to polymer materials
3. Introduction to precise mold design
4. General introduction of injection molding machine design and function
5. Corresponding specification and property of machine
6. Innovative injection molding process
7. Visit of plastic injection molding
8. Introduction of process and CAE / Modeling practice of Moldex3D
9. Interpretation of results of filling and packing
10. Interpretation of results of cooling and warpage
11. Post processing
12. Student oral presentation"

textbook.ch:
"Moldex3D真實三維模流分析技術與應用，科盛科技股份有限公司 編著
C-MOLD射出成型模具設計，周文祥 譯，新文京開發出版股份有限公司
射出成型原理與製程，陳夏宗、李海梅、周文祥、陳清祺 編著，五南圖書出版有限公司"
textbook.en: "C-MOLD Design Guide: A resource For Plastics Engineers, AC Technology, Ithaca, New York, USA, 1995 (周文祥 譯)"

gradMethod.en: Attendance: 10%; Assignment: 30%; Midterm Exam: 30%; Final Exam: 30%

、
